alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:47AM AKST until March 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially along the Sterling Highway corridor from Homer to Soldotna and northward to Kenai and Nikiski. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of snow developing early Wednesday morning will persist through Wednesday afternoon. Snow is expected to be fluffy, and areas where there will be higher winds near Cook Inlet could see reduced visibility and potential for snow drifts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
